text: Moses, Jordanɨn Fanemɨn nguazir vuer kam, an aruem anadi naghɨn itir nguazim, a ia ganɨngi. Eghtɨ ian amuiroghboriba ko asɨziba an ikiam. Eghtɨ ian mɨdorozir gumaziba, me bar uan mɨdorozir biziba inigh Jordanɨn Fanem giregh vongɨn mangɨ uan aveghbuabar faragh mangɨ. Egh men akuragh mɨdorozim damu.
